testsuite.test:
Preconditions for this widget
Instructions: 1) Make sure all conditions listed here are fullfilled, this test widget depends on them! 2) Make sure you have at least 2 calls in your call records for MISSED calls. 3) Make sure you have at least 2 calls in your call records for OUTGOING calls. 4) Make sure you have at least 2 calls in your call records for RECEIVED calls.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findCallRecords Find all
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findCallRecords onCallRecordsFound Does callback fire at all
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findCallRecords Throw INVALID PARAMETER for no params
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findCallRecords Throw INVALID PARAMETER for missing params
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findCallRecords Throw INVALID PARAMETER for wrong param
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findCallRecords Throw INVALID PARAMETER for wrong param
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

findCallRecords Verify number of MISSED calls
Instructions: 1) Make sure you have at least one MISSED call in your phone's call record. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Is the number correct?

findCallRecords Verify number of OUTGOING calls
Instructions: 1) Make sure you have at least one OUTGOING call in your phone's call record. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Is the number correct?

findCallRecords Verify number of RECEIVED calls
Instructions: 1) Make sure you have at least one RECEIVED call in your phone's call record. 2) Click 'GO'.
Expected behaviour: Is the number correct?

getCallRecord Verify first MISSED call
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getCallRecord Verify first OUTGOING call
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getCallRecord Verify first RECEIVED call
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getCallRecord Throw INVALID PARAMETER no params
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getCallRecord Throw INVALID PARAMETER missing ID
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getCallRecord Throw INVALID PARAMETER wrong type of ID
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getCallRecord Throw INVALID PARAMETER wrong call record type
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getCallRecordCnt Verify it returns a number
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getCallRecordCnt Verify number of missed calls
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the number of missed calls correct?

getCallRecordCnt Verify number of received calls
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the number of received calls correct?

getCallRecordCnt Verify number of outgoing calls
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: Is the number of outgoing calls correct?

getCallRecordCnt Throws INVALID PARAMETER for no parameter
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

getCallRecordCnt Retruns 0 for unknown parameter
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

initiateVoiceCall Verify the method call works at all
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) A phone call should be started.
Expected behaviour: Did a phone call to the number undefined get initiated?

onCallEvent Is callback invoked
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Call this phone's number, make sure it rings. 3) This widget should be triggered and make this test pass automatically (times out otherwise).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onCallEvent Verify call is MISSED
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Call this phone's number, make sure it rings. 3) Don't pick up the phone! 4) Hang up the phone you are calling from. 5) This widget should be triggered and make this test pass automatically (times out otherwise).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onCallEvent Verify call is RECEIVED
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Call this phone's number, make sure it rings. 3) Pick up the phone (to make sure call was received)! 4) Hang up now. 5) This widget should be triggered and make this test pass automatically (times out otherwise).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onCallEvent Verify call is OUTGOING
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Put widget into mini/floating mode. 3) Open the dialer and call any number. 4) This widget should be triggered and make this test pass automatically (times out otherwise).
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onCallEvent Verify caller number for MISSED call
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Call this phone's number, make sure it rings. 3) Don't pick up the phone! 4) The number you called from should be shown.
Expected behaviour: Is the above number the one you called this phone from?

onCallEvent Verify caller number for RECEIVED call
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Call this phone's number, make sure it rings. 3) Pick up the phone! 4) The number you called from should be shown.
Expected behaviour: Is the above number the one you called this phone from?

onCallEvent Verify number for OUTGOING call
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) Put widget into mini/floating mode. 3) Open the dialer and call any number. 4) Hang up after it rang at least once. 5) The number you dialed should be shown, confirm it please!
Expected behaviour: Is the above number the one you dialed?

onCallEvent after initiateVoiceCall fires at all
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) A call will be initiated. 3) Hang up after a bit (if onCallEvent fires test will succeed, timeout otherwise)
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onCallEvent after initiateVoiceCall gets correct CallRecordType
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) A call will be initiated. 3) Hang up after a bit (if onCallEvent fires test will succeed, timeout otherwise)
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

onCallEvent after initiateVoiceCall gets correct phoneNumber
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO'. 2) A call will be initiated. 3) Hang up after a bit (if onCallEvent fires test will succeed, timeout otherwise)
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.
